mapper.insert:
insert into pai_dui_ji_lu
yfwjlId,
ddId,
pdsj,
dlh,
pdh,
zt, qytb
values
#{yfwjlId},
#{ddId},
now(),
#{dlh},
#{pdh},
${@com.znczQydCs.entity.PaiDuiJiLu@PAI_DUI_ZHONG}, ${@com.znczQydCs.entity.Main@WEI_TONG_BU}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from pai_dui_ji_lu where 1=1
and ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')

select pdjl.*,dd.ddh from pai_dui_ji_lu pdjl,ding_dan dd where pdjl.ddId=dd.id
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
limit #{rowNum},#{rows}
